tool_description: Get random fun 'Would You Rather' questions that are up to date! :) Data is constantly being updated/added!
title: Would You Rather

api_list.name: question
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://would-you-rather.p.rapidapi.com/wyr/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "would-you-rather.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
